article_title: Cabot to Cut 300 Jobs Amid Lower Oil Prices, Falling Demand
article_text:
Cabot Corp. plans to cut 300 jobs as part of a broader restructuring in response to sharply lower oil prices and falling demand, both of which have battered results in recent quarters.

The Boston specialty chemicals and performance materials company said it would book a charge of $35 million before taxes, largely tied to severance for laid off...
